Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli

Class CLI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.CLI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Visualizable, Runnable
public class CLI extends Object implements Visualizable, Runnable
Implement the interface Visualizable with a CLI.
